labels: Open source Inventory management desktop application
name: Seagram Inventory
short_description:
Seagram Inventory is an open source inventory management application for desktop, built using web technologies. Our aim is to create a simple, easy to use inventory application for small offices which does not require any technical skill or training to install and operate. 

Seagram Inventory is not a finished project. Its under active development. Presently it can handle purchase/sale invoices, simple purchase/sale reports, manage products in different categories etc. But these are nowhere near the feature set required for a production quality inventory management software. 
We need your support to make Seagram Inventory feature rich, at the same time without compromise on simplicity. You can support us by suggesting new features or reporting bugs via forum in our official support page.
Please join the following group (Login using Facebook Id) to use support forum. 
http://www.hallowdemon.net/groups/seagram-inventory/

Default user name:  Admin
Default password: Admin
summary: Seagram Inventory is an open source inventory management application
